documentType: prison staff roster and overtime authorization forms
summary: This document is a collection of staff rosters and overtime authorization forms for the Food Service Department at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York for the pay period August 4-17, 2019. It includes detailed work schedules, overtime requests, and a separate inmate roster, providing a snapshot of prison operations during the period Jeffrey Epstein was incarcerated there.

locations: MCC New York (Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York)
Food Service Department, MCC New York
keyFacts: The documents cover the pay period August 4-17, 2019, which is the period during which Jeffrey Epstein was incarcerated at MCC New York prior to his death on August 10, 2019.

Overtime authorization forms repeatedly cite 'NO OTHER STAFF AVAILABLE' and 'ONE COOK SUPERVISOR ON AL AND ONE COOK SUPERVISOR ON SL' as reasons for overtime, suggesting potential understaffing in the Food Service Department.
A separate inmate roster dated August 15, 2019, is included, listing female inmates (e.g., Adrienne Roberts, Cindy Carrillo) housed in unit B01A.
Food Service Administrator Rocco Lupo both authorized overtime for subordinates and requested compensatory time for his own administrative overtime work.
Employee Towanda Smith's overtime was authorized for 'Pest Control' duties, which must be completed after hours.
